original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 323.90/324.00 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 323.90/324.00 to the US dollar on Thursday, from 324.00/25 the previous day, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.06.2025 closed at  13.55/70 percent from 13.55/65 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.02.2026, auction maturity, closed at 13.80/90 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 closed at 13.80/85 percent from 13.75/85 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.03.2028 closed at 14.10/25 percent from 14.05/15 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 14.05/30 percent, from 14.10/20 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2032 closed at 14.10/30 percent, from 14.10/25 percent. (Colombo/Dec28/2023)
